hashtag.body:
Thank you for using #TheRealUnrealStory when you post or share our story. It helps people find and follow the thread.

Use it on Instagram (posts/reels/stories), Telegram, YouTube (titles/descriptions/comments), TikTok, X/Twitter, Facebook, blogs & Medium, forums & Reddit, LinkedIn — every mention matters!
modal.tile1.body: My name is Nico, and I’m Adam’s friend. I became an involuntary participant in this “real-unreal” story. I’ve reached out to a wide audience for support — I can’t manage alone anymore. So I’m telling our story without embellishment and launching a fundraiser on GoFundMe in parallel.
modal.tile2.body: Adam is a wonderful person and a surgeon with unique techniques, a philanthropist. Since 2019, he has faced blood oncology several times. In July 2025 — a new severe turn: another form of leukemia. At the same time — personal shocks and losses.
modal.tile3.body: Adam’s story is full of real surprises. There were incredible helpers — without them he wouldn’t have survived to this day. There were also those who deliberately harmed. And there were people whom the universe seemed to bring at the right moment.

donate.info.title: About support and project plans
donate.info.body:
I run the media side of the project alone: research and writing, editing and translation, visuals and audio, publishing and site maintenance. Right now — Adam, myself, and other contributors — we are in a difficult financial situation as a direct consequence of the events described here.

Most of my time goes to supporting Adam: coordination, communication, daily logistics. In parallel I develop the story across formats — writing, fact-checking, translating, creating visuals and audio — and keep the site running.

Your voluntary contribution matters: it sustains the work on the project (research, texts, translations, visuals and audio, publications, hosting, tech support) and helps cover expenses that arise directly from this story. That way I can keep the pace of work and care around it.

Next — learning and tools.
— practical courses: AI practice, content and web architecture, bots and automations, AI avatars;
— web apps (some features free): image stylization and comics, realistic photo/video, melodies and music, etc.

Stay tuned: even if today isn’t the moment to donate, check back — there will be updates and releases here. Reposts help a lot too.
